plugin.name: autohunt
plugin.author: Daniel Block
plugin.description:
Auto hunt summary

Simple automation for aardwolf hunting. Will attempt to open doors in the process, will abort if obstructions such as locked doors or quicksand are encountered.

trigger.title: door1
trigger.pattern: ^Magical wards around the .*? bounce you back\.$

trigger.title: hunt3
trigger.pattern: ^The trail of .*? is confusing\, but you\'re reasonably sure .*? headed (.*?)\.$

trigger.title: hunt4
trigger.pattern: ^\s{0,1}You are certain that .*? is (.*?) from here\.$

trigger.title: hunt1
trigger.pattern: ^You are almost certain that .*? is (.*?) from here\.$

trigger.title: hunt2
trigger.pattern: ^\s*You are confident that .*? passed through here\, heading (.*?)\.$

trigger.title: fail7
trigger.pattern: ^The .*? is locked and you do not have a key\.$

trigger.title: fail5
trigger.pattern: ^You need to use a boat\, fly\, or swim underwater to go there\.$

trigger.title: fail4
trigger.pattern: ^You couldn\'t find a path to (.*?) from here\.$

trigger.title: fail3
trigger.pattern: ^You have no idea what you\'re doing\, but maybe .*? left .*?\?$

trigger.title: fail2
trigger.pattern: ^You seem unable to hunt that target for some reason\.$

trigger.title: fail1
trigger.pattern: ^No\-one in this area by that name\.$

plugin.script:
dir = "" target = ""
function openDoor() SendToServer("open "..dir) end
function finish() Note("\nAuto hunt completed.\n") disableTriggers() return true end
function failed() Note("\nAuto hunt obstruction occurred, disabling triggers.\n") disableTriggers() return true end
function start(mob) Note("\nAuto hunt engaged.\n") enableTriggers() target = mob SendToServer("hunt "..target) return true end
function advance(name,line,replaceMap)
dir = replaceMap["1"] Note("Auto hunt advancing: "..dir.."\n") SendToServer(dir..";hunt "..target) end
function enableTriggers() EnableTriggerGroup("autohunt",true) --TriggerEnabled("fail1",true) --TriggerEnabled("fail2",true) --TriggerEnabled("fail3",true) --TriggerEnabled("fail4",true) --TriggerEnabled("fail5",true) --TriggerEnabled("fail6",true) --TriggerEnabled("fail7",true) --TriggerEnabled("fail8",true) --TriggerEnabled("hunt1",true) --TriggerEnabled("hunt2",true) --TriggerEnabled("hunt3",true) --TriggerEnabled("hunt4",true) --TriggerEnabled("success",true) --TriggerEnabled("door1",true) --TriggerEnabled("door2",true) end
function disableTriggers() EnableTriggerGroup("autohunt",false) --TriggerEnabled("fail1",false) --TriggerEnabled("fail2",false) --TriggerEnabled("fail3",false) --TriggerEnabled("fail4",false) --TriggerEnabled("fail5",false) --TriggerEnabled("fail6",false) --TriggerEnabled("fail7",false) --TriggerEnabled("fail8",false) --TriggerEnabled("hunt1",false) --TriggerEnabled("hunt2",false) --TriggerEnabled("hunt3",false) --TriggerEnabled("hunt4",false) --TriggerEnabled("success",false) --TriggerEnabled("door1",false) --TriggerEnabled("door2",false) end
function OnBackgroundStartup() disableTriggers() end
RegisterSpecialCommand("ah","start")
Note("Auto Hunt Plugin installed")
